green-pass-activation.title: Activate 3-G evidence
green-pass-activation.description: With this application you can activate your 3-G evidence.
green-pass-activation.additional-information: Here you can scan a QR code or upload an existing PDF or image with a QR code to activate your 3-G evidence for the period of its validity. When you upload a new evidence, any existing evidence will be replaced. Please note that this will still require you to obtain a ticket for rooms in order to comply with 3G rules.
green-pass-activation.success-activation-body: Your 3-G evidence has been successfully activated.
green-pass-activation.invalid-qr-code-body: This QR code is not a valid 3-G evidence. Please use another one or select the manual 3-G inspection at the ticket store.
green-pass-activation.no-qr-code-body: No QR code was found in the uploaded document. Please use another document or select the manual 3-G inspection at the ticket store.
green-pass-activation.data-protection: What does TU Graz do with your data? You can find the data protection declaration for the app "TU Graz Greenlight" here:
green-pass-activation.uploaded-success-message: A 3-G evidence has been successfully verified and is active until
green-pass-activation.delete-certificate-failed-body: An error occurred while removing your 3-G evidence.
green-pass-activation.delete-certificate-not-found-body: The certificate could not be found.
green-pass-activation.delete-certificate-success-body: Your 3-G evidence has been successfully removed.
green-pass-activation.confirm-text: Do you really want to delete your 3-G evidence?

acquire-ticket.title: Acquire ticket for a place
acquire-ticket.description: Here you can acquire a ticket for a location at TU Graz.
acquire-ticket.additional-information: This is needed to be allowed to enter a location at TU Graz. If you have activated a 3-G evidence, you can use it to log in directly at a location at TU Graz for a certain period of time. If you have not activated a 3-G evidence yet, please use the menu item
acquire-ticket.additional-information-2: to activate a evidence. Alternatively, you can manually confirm that you are carrying 3-G evidence and be able to prove it in case of a manual control.
acquire-ticket.no-proof-found-message: No valid 3-G evidence was found. Please activate a valid 3-G detection under the menu item
acquire-ticket.valid-proof-found-message: A valid 3-G evidence was found. Please select a location to create a ticket.
acquire-ticket.manual-proof-text: I certify that I am vaccinated, tested, or recovered and carry valid evidence of such for the duration of my stay in this room and can present such evidence in the event of a manual inspection.
acquire-ticket.create-ticket-success-body: The acquired ticket for {{place}} was successfully created.
acquire-ticket.check-in-link-description: Do you want to support contact tracing at TU Graz?
acquire-ticket.manage-tickets-text: You can manage your active tickets at:

acquire-3g-ticket.additional-information: You can scan a QR code or upload an existing PDF or image to use it to log in directly at a location at TU Graz for a certain period of time. This is needed to be allowed to enter a location at TU Graz. Alternatively, you can manually confirm that you are carrying 3G evidence and be able to prove it in case of a manual control.
acquire-3g-ticket.success-activation-body: Your 3-G evidence has been successfully activated.
acquire-3g-ticket.invalid-qr-code-body: This QR code is not a valid 3-G evidence. Please use another one or select the manual 3-G inspection at the ticket store.
acquire-3g-ticket.no-qr-code-body: No QR code was found in the uploaded document. Please use another document or select the manual 3-G inspection at the ticket store.
acquire-3g-ticket.data-protection: What does TU Graz do with your data? You can find the data protection declaration for the app "TU Graz Greenlight" here:
acquire-3g-ticket.confirm-text: Do you really want to delete your 3-G evidence?
acquire-3g-ticket.manual-proof-text: I certify that I am vaccinated, tested, or recovered and carry valid evidence of such for the duration of my stay in this room and can present such evidence in the event of a manual inspection.
acquire-3g-ticket.create-ticket-success-body: The acquired ticket for {{place}} was successfully created.
acquire-3g-ticket.refresh-ticket-success-body: The acquired ticket for {{place}} was successfully refreshed.
acquire-3g-ticket.check-in-link-description: Do you want to use contact tracing at TU Graz?
acquire-3g-ticket.manage-tickets-text: You can manage your active tickets at:
acquire-3g-ticket.confirm-checkbox-valid-cert-text: I confirm that my information is correct and that I may be liable to prosecution in the event of fraud.
acquire-3g-ticket.confirm-checkbox-no-cert-text: I confirm that the information I have provided is correct and that I may be liable to prosecution in the event of fraud.
acquire-3g-ticket.found-valid-3g-preCheck: Stored valid 3-G information could be found.
acquire-3g-ticket.found-valid-selfetest-preCheck: A locally saved self-test was found.
acquire-3g-ticket.not-same-person: The person in the uploaded certificate does not match the person logged in.
acquire-3g-ticket.cannot-process-data: The uploaded evidence could not be processed.
acquire-3g-ticket.cannot-process-data-body: The uploaded evidence could not be processed. Please try again or skip the upload process.
acquire-3g-ticket.validate-error-body: Please try again or skip the process.
acquire-3g-ticket.hcert-invalid-body: Please upload a valid 3-G certificate or skip the process.

show-active-tickets.title: Show all active tickets
show-active-tickets.description: Here you can see the list of all valid tickets. You have to show them in case of a manual control.
show-active-tickets.no-tickets-message: You do not have any valid tickets!
show-active-tickets.refresh-ticket-success-body: The ticket for {{place}} was successfully refreshed.
show-active-tickets.delete-ticket-success-body: The ticket for {{place}} was successfully deleted.
show-active-tickets.other-error-body: Es ist ein unbekannter Fehler aufgetreten.

info.title: Information
info.description: With this application you get information about greenlight.tugraz.at.

error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!
